MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL29 postcode area of Colwyn Bay affecting properties in Conway Road, Alexandra Road, Lansdowne Road and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at 11:49am. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:15pm on 18th November 2020
